articles.content: The two-time Olympic champion Eliud Kipchoge has bettered his own world record by 30 seconds at the Berlin Marathon. The Kenyan star clocked a time of two hours, one minute and nine seconds to beat h… [+181 chars]

articles.title: Northern Ireland 2-1 Kosovo: A 'big sigh' for Baraclough as Windsor Park erupts - BBC
articles.description: After a 'big sigh', Ian Baraclough has called on his Northern Ireland team to back up Saturday's last-gasp victory over Kosovo at Windsor Park.
articles.content:
Josh Magennis' superb injury-time header completed the comeback win for Northern Ireland
